doc.title: Willow
doc.plot: The evil Queen Bavmorda is threatening the land. Lives are doomed and all hope for the future is lost, that is, until a brave farmer, Willow Ufgood sets out to deliver a baby that, in the coming years will overthrow Bavmorda. Her name, Alora Dannen. But Willow's trek will not be easy, but he has help from friends in the Nelwyn Village, Madmartigan, Fin Raziel and more. Beware of evil spirits and knights lurking in the shadows! The fate of all humanity rests in Willow's hands. Are you brave enough to help him?
